price: 50. Hubaal kanu (Cadaabka) waa waxaad ka shaki qabteen oo ka doodeyseen.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā mā kuntum bihi tamtarūna
